resources.string: Are you an introvert or an extrovert?
Take this quiz and find out!

According to research, about 70 percent of CEO\'s describe themselves as introverts. The list of well-known \"Who\'s Who\" of corporate introverted CEOs includes: Bill Gates, Warren Buffet, movie magnate Steven Spielberg, and Sara Lee\'s Brenda Barnes. Introverts make up 40 percent of the population

Researchers estimate extroverts make up 50 – 74 percent of the population. These “social butterflies” thrive under social stimulation. Extroverts focus on their external environment, the people and activities around them.
Also known as ambiverts, extroverted introverts possess a combination of the traits found in the broad personality types of introversion and extraversion (also spelled extroversion)
